channel.title: Intellectual Fun - Alternate Complexed Sentences
channel.description:
Might get locked, I'm not really sure if what I'm about to post is allowed? I guess it's kind of like a forum game but a bit more intellectual than some... and new, 'cos I just invented it. :)
Anyway, the idea/or point of this thread is this:
[i]I'm going to start by typing a really basic sentence, then the next person to post has to type the same sentence but with slightly more complexity. Use a theasarus or dictionary for alternate words, or change one word to a few more words regarding to the same word in question.
For example:
Me: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. Post 2: The speedy, murky-coloured vulpix elevated above the idle mongrel Post 3: ^Complicates that sentence even further, but still referring to a fox jumping over a dog, get it?[/i]
If you can't think of a more complexed word, find an alternate, words like "the" and "and" etc. don't matter. If it helps keep the thread open, try discussing your source and meaning of words, whether you like the word or not etc.
If you really can't find another way to complex your sentence, leave it until another one pops up, or create a new one.
Now I'm off to bed, will see how the thread does in the morning - will tidy the post up a bit too.
Sentence: [b]The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog[/b] [i](Type it in bold).[/i]

item.title: Intellectual Fun - Alternate Complexed Sentences
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

The expeditious multi colored vixen accelerated at at 35 degree angle at 5m/s for 5000 milliseconds in a parabolic path due to the acceleration of gravity then landed 23 meters away from its initial position, which is two meters less than it would have traveled but unfortunately he had forgotten to factor in wind resistance, which just so happened to be on the opposite side of the apathetic prostrate canine that he was facing before, but is now in front of.

Read full topic

item.title: Intellectual Fun - Alternate Complexed Sentences
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

The expeditious multi colored vixen accelerated at a 35 degree angle at 5m/s for 5 seconds in a parabolic path due to the acceleration of gravity then landed 25 meters away from its initial position, which just so happened to be on the opposite side of the apathetic canine that was recently in front of it.

Read full topic

item.title: Intellectual Fun - Alternate Complexed Sentences
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Okay, now to do this using my own range of vocabulary without a fucking thesaurus or dictionary and making it sound inane.

I’ll start over from OP’s post.

The elusive brown fox hops over the lackadaisical pup.

PS: Don’t change all of the words, just half/some.

Read full topic
